title: Dark Desires: Love That's Out of This World
description: Explore your darkest fantasies in this spooky new anthology of paranormal erotica. From virgins to vampires, ghostly encounters that are far from cold to ghoulish girl fun the stories will send a shiver down your spine.Xcite Books offer the very best erotic writing. Xcite Books have achieved the Number One position in three erotic categories on Amazon and are core-stocked by Waterstones.
author: Miranda Forbes
